item.title: 独家：首席执行官称，IAG 将考虑出售欧洲航空 20% 的股份
item.description: 随着西班牙欧罗巴航空公司（Air Europa）的所有者继续与法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）和汉莎航空（Lufthansa）就出售该公司股份进行谈判，英国航空公司（British Airways）的所有者国际航空集团（IAG）将考虑出售其持有的该公司 20% 的股份。【原文：British Airways-owner IAG will consider selling its 20% stake in Air Europa as the Spanish airline's owner continues talks with Air France-KLM and Lufthansa to sell a stake in the company.】

item.title: 法拉利称美国汽车关税不会影响 2025 年财务目标
item.description: 意大利豪华跑车制造商法拉利周四表示，尽管美国征收新的汽车关税，但法拉利今年的财务目标将保持不变。【原文：Italian luxury sports carmaker Ferrari said on Thursday its financial targets for this year will remain unchanged despite the new auto tariffs imposed by the United States.】

item.title: 受俄罗斯与西方对峙和制裁影响的能源资产
item.description: 美国周二分别与乌克兰和俄罗斯达成停止海上袭击和能源目标袭击的协议，华盛顿同意推动取消对莫斯科的部分制裁。【原文：The United States reached separate deals on Tuesday with Ukraine and Russia to halt attacks at sea and against energy targets, with Washington agreeing to push to lift some sanctions against Moscow.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 任命芯片业资深人士罗伯特-费勒为首席执行官
item.description: 芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 周四表示，在董事会将前首席执行官 Gregg Lowe 赶下台几个月后，该公司任命业内资深人士 Robert Feurle 担任首席执行官。【原文：Chipmaker Wolfspeed said on Thursday it appointed industry veteran Robert Feurle as its CEO, months after its board ousted former top boss Gregg Lowe.】

item.title: 消息人士称，英伟达支持的科睿唯安计划缩小美国上市规模
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周四告诉路透社，CoreWeave 计划缩小其美国首次公开发行股票的规模，并将股票价格定在区间以下。【原文：CoreWeave plans to reduce the size of its U.S. initial public offering and price the shares below range, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国第四季度企业利润激增
item.description: 美国企业利润在第四季度大幅反弹，但关税导致的不确定经济前景为企业在第一季度创造了一个充满挑战的环境。【原文：U.S. corporate profits rebounded sharply in the fourth quarter, but an uncertain economic outlook due to tariffs is creating a challenging environment for businesses in the first quarter.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份商品贸易逆差收窄
item.description: 由于出口增长，2 月份美国货物贸易逆差有所收窄，这可能会缓和经济学家对第一季度经济增长大幅放缓的预期。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods narrowed in February amid a rise in exports, which could temper economists' expectations for a sharp slowdown in economic growth in the first quarter.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格下跌 1%，至 5 周低点，原因是需求减少，且将发布储气报告
item.description: 美国天然气期货周四下跌约1%，跌至五周低点，原因是预计下周需求将低于此前预期，而且联邦报告预计将显示上周公用事业公司连续第二周增加天然气库存，而能源公司通常会在这个时候从储存库中提取天然气。【原文：U.S. natural gas futures eased about 1% to a five-week low on Thursday on forecasts for lower demand next week than previously expected and ahead of a federal report expected to show utilities added gas to inventories for a second week in a row last week during a time when energy firm usually pull gas from storage.】

item.title: 乌克兰国家铁路公司称网络攻击后部分恢复在线服务
item.description: 乌克兰国有铁路公司 Ukrzaliznytsia 是该国最大的运输公司，该公司周四表示，在客运和货运系统遭到大规模网络攻击后，已部分恢复了在线服务。【原文：Ukraine's state-owned railway Ukrzaliznytsia, the country's largest carrier, has partially restored online services after a large-scale cyber attack hit passenger and freight transport systems, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行称人工智能投资将影响增长战略
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行首席执行官戴夫-麦凯（Dave McKay）周四强调了人工智能在推动这家加拿大顶级贷款机构下一阶段发展中的作用。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada CEO Dave McKay on Thursday underscored the role of artificial intelligence in fueling the top Canadian lender's next phase of growth.】

item.title: 阿根廷部长表示，IMF会谈的目标是达成 200 亿美元贷款协议
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）周四表示，阿根廷正在与国际货币基金组织（IMF）谈判一项价值 200 亿美元的协议，这也是阿根廷首次正式为这项酝酿已久的计划确定一个数字。【原文：Argentine Economy Minister Luis Caputo said on Thursday that the country was negotiating a $20 billion deal with the International Monetary Fund (IMF), formally putting a figure on the long-mooted program for the first time.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会希望减少科技指令的重叠 - Virkkunen
item.description: 欧盟委员会数字事务主管亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）周四表示，欧盟委员会正在研究如何减少技术规则的重叠，以回应企业对近年来欧盟新法规泛滥的抱怨。【原文：The European Commission is looking at ways to cut overlap in tech rules in response to complaints from business about the flood of new EU regulations in recent years, digital chief Henna Virkkunen said on Thursday.】

item.title: 司法部成立放松管制工作组
item.description: 美国司法部周四成立了一个放松管制特别工作组，倡导反对可能损害竞争的法规，尤其是在农业、住房、交通、医疗保健和能源等影响消费者的市场。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice launched a deregulatory task force on Thursday to advocate against regulations that could harm competition, especially in markets that affect consumers such as agriculture, housing, transportation, healthcare and energy.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数走低
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数有所下滑，而 3 月份的失业率似乎保持稳定。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits slipped last week, while the jobless rate appeared to have held steady in March.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，能源交易商维托尔有意以 30 亿美元出售美国页岩油生产商
item.description: 全球大宗商品贸易商维托尔公司（Vitol）正在探索出售其 VTX Energy Partners 业务，据熟悉此事的人士透露，这笔交易对这家美国页岩油气生产商的估值可能高达 30 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Global commodities trader Vitol is exploring a sale of its VTX Energy Partners business, in a deal that could value the U.S. shale oil and gas producer at as much as $3 billion, including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 前 Meta 高管为人工智能助理初创公司融资 1500 万美元
item.description: 两位前 Meta 人工智能公司高管周四表示，已为将开发人工智能个人助理的初创公司 Yutori 筹集了 1500 万美元。【原文：Two former Meta artificial intelligence executives have raised $15 million for Yutori, a startup that will develop AI personal assistants, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会表示，欧盟正准备对美国新的进口关税做出 "强有力的、有分寸的 "回应
item.description: 欧盟委员会周四表示，欧盟正在准备对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布的进口汽车新关税做出回应。【原文：The European Union is preparing its response to the new import tariffs on imported vehicles announced by U.S. President Donald Trump, the European Commission said on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞标美国汽车关税跳票
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 就伦敦 "火腿罐头 "大厦提出的 4.27 亿美元更高报价遭到拒绝
item.description: 一位接近此事的消息人士称，伦敦地标性建筑 "火腿罐头 "的所有者拒绝了 Blackstone 为该物业提出的约 3.3 亿英镑（4.2692 亿美元）的更高报价，Nuveen 将赌注押在欧洲房地产资产需求的改善上。【原文：The owner of London's landmark "Can of Ham" building has rejected a higher offer from Blackstone of about 330 million pounds ($426.92 million) for the property, with Nuveen betting on an improving appetite for European real estate assets, a source close to the matter said.】

item.title: Global Eggs 同意以 11 亿美元收购 Hillandale 农场
item.description: 法里亚周四告诉路透社，巴西企业家里卡多-法里亚（Ricardo Faria）控制的公司 Global Eggs 已同意以 11 亿美元的价格收购美国鸡蛋生产商 Hillandale Farms。【原文：Global Eggs, a company controlled by Brazilian entrepreneur Ricardo Faria, has agreed to buy U.S. egg producer Hillandale Farms for $1.1 billion, Faria told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 您附近的咖啡店即将迎来：两位数的咖啡价格上涨
item.description: 如果您最喜欢的咖啡豆从货架上消失了，别担心，它们很快就会回来。坏消息是，它们的价格将上涨 25%。【原文：If your favourite coffee beans have vanished from the shelves, don't worry - they will return soon. The bad news is they will be up to 25% more expensive.】

item.title: 英国反垄断监督机构称 SLB-ChampionX 交易可能会削弱竞争
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周四表示，油田服务公司 SLB 拟斥资 80 亿美元收购规模较小的竞争对手 ChampionX，这可能会导致英国国内的竞争大大减弱。【原文：Britain's competition regulator said on Thursday that oilfield services company SLB's proposed $8 billion deal to buy smaller rival ChampionX could result in a substantial lessening of competition within the UK.】

item.title: 宝马呼吁达成跨大西洋协议以防止关税螺旋式上升
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马（BMW）周四发表声明，回应美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布的新汽车关税，敦促欧盟和美国达成协议，防止贸易冲突升级。【原文：German carmaker BMW on Thursday urged the European Union and United States to strike a deal to prevent a spiralling trade conflict, in a statement issued in response to President Donald Trump's announcement of new car tariffs.】

item.title: 解说员：俄罗斯逮捕亿万富翁莫什科维奇事件详情如何？
item.description: 俄罗斯检察官周四要求法官以涉嫌大规模欺诈罪对该国顶级农业公司 Rusagro 的创始人、亿万富翁瓦迪姆-莫什科维奇（Vadim Moshkovich）进行审前拘留。【原文：Russian prosecutors asked a judge on Thursday to put billionaire Vadim Moshkovich, founder of the country's top agriculture company Rusagro, in pre-trial detention on suspicion of large-scale fraud.】

item.title: H&M 首席执行官称美国关税将使美国消费者蒙受损失
item.description: 快速时尚零售商 H&M 公司首席执行官周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高进口关税的行动将推高美国消费者的消费价格，该公司正在转变供应链以适应新的贸易壁垒。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's actions to raise import tariffs will drive prices up for American consumers, the CEO of fast-fashion retailer H&M said on Thursday, as the company shifts its supply chain to adapt to new trade barriers.】

item.title: 独家新闻特朗普政府指示间谍卫星机构监视美墨边境
item.description: 作为全面打击非法移民和贩毒集团行动的一部分，特朗普政府已指示两家情报机构在美墨边境地区训练卫星监控能力。【原文：The Trump administration has directed two intelligence agencies to train their satellite surveillance capabilities on the U.S.-Mexico border region as part of a sweeping crackdown on illegal immigration and drug cartels.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普政府指示间谍卫星机构监视美墨边境
item.description: 作为全面打击非法移民和贩毒集团行动的一部分，特朗普政府已指示两家情报机构在美墨边境地区训练卫星监控能力。【原文：The Trump administration has directed two intelligence agencies to train their satellite surveillance capabilities on the U.S.-Mexico border region as part of a sweeping crackdown on illegal immigration and drug cartels.】

item.title: 巴西认为贸易紧张局势未见好转先见恶化
item.description: 巴西外贸部长周四警告说，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的美国关税可能会加剧全球贸易紧张局势，而这种紧张局势在好转之前很可能会恶化。【原文：Brazil's Secretary of Foreign Trade warned on Thursday that the global trade tensions being ratcheted up by Donald Trump's U.S. tariffs were likely to get worse before they get better.】

item.title: 高管称美国银行第一季度房贷申请猛增 80
item.description: 美国银行消费者贷款主管表示，1 月至 3 月间，抵押贷款申请激增了 80%，原因是购房者受到房屋库存增加和长期债券收益率下降的诱惑。【原文：Bank of America saw an 80% jump in mortgage applications between January and March, its executive of consumer lending said, as buyers were tempted by increasing home inventory and lower long-term bond yield.】

item.title: 条款表显示，中国电动汽车制造商新奥将为电动汽车开发融资 4.5 亿美元
item.description: 据路透社周四查阅的一份条款书显示，中国电动汽车制造商尼奥将通过配股融资约35亿港元（4.501亿美元），用于开发智能电动汽车。 (1美元=7.7763港元）【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Nio will raise around HK$3.50 billion ($450.1 million) via a share placement to develop its smart EVs, according to a term sheet reviewed by Reuters on Thursday. ($1 = 7.7763 Hong Kong dollars)】
